Check your register.. and go to the following:
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE then press on the + by SOFTWARE then press on the + by Argonaut Software. Then you see croc.. click on this.

Now look at Directory.. If this is diffrent then were you have installed croc.. then change..

if thats done it should work.
